Cell.Data: If some concepts in the text are unclear or do not make sense, try looking that concept up in this xml as the text in this xml serves as an encyclopeadia you have a good chance of finding it. Unclear terms can be found in the AoW_Glossary. Do not change anything that is between [ and ] because it could break the hyperlink and strip it of its function. Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.
List of all Shakarn Weapons and Mods
所有蜥蜴人武器和模块列表
List of all Shakarn Hero Skills

{XML_SPECIES_SHAKARN@RACE@DESCRIPTION}[br/][br/]ORIGIN: Not much is known about the Shakarn, although their agents seem to have been among us for longer than we realized. This reptilian race originates from an oceanic homeworld covered in atolls and archipelagos. Having conquered the sea, they took to the skies to further expand their empire, but when they first encountered the size and power of the Star Union, any invasion plans they had were postponed.[br/][br/]While the majority of the Shakarn forces bided their time on the edges of the known universe, their agents infiltrated key locations by mimicking the appearance of its inhabitants through advanced holo-tech, stealing any knowledge and technology they considered interesting. After the Cataclysm left the Star Union in ruins and chaos, the Shakarn have seized the opportunity to conquer the remnants of the human empire.

{XML_SPECIES_SHAKARN@RACE@DESCRIPTION}[br/][br/]起源：虽然蜥蜴人的特工潜伏在我们之中的时间如此漫长，但我们对蜥蜴人的了解所知甚少。这种爬行物种起源于一个被环礁和群岛覆盖的海洋星球。他们征服了海洋之后，就将爪子伸向了天空，进一步扩张他们的帝国。然而，当他们在第一次见识到了星际联盟的规模和力量之后，所有的入侵计划都被推迟。[br/][br/]蜥蜴人的主力部队在已知的宇宙边缘等待时机，而他们的特工则利用先进的全息技术模仿当地居民的外表，潜入关键地点，窃取了许多他们感兴趣的知识和技术。当星际联盟因大灾变而陷入毁灭和混乱时，蜥蜴人抓住机会，征服了残余的人类帝国。

[bulletlist][bullet]Human-animal hybrids looking for a place to live in peace[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000E]Bio[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,0000039E0000000F]Kinetic[/hyperlink] Damage Types[/bullet][bullet]Use Primal Pheromones when wounded to turn the tide of battle[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]ORIGIN: The Therians are a faction of people who originate from test-subjects of a secret Terratech genetics project, mixing both animal and human DNA to cure genetic diseases and create superior beings. The project was shut down after backlash when their first test subject, called Deer, broadcast the horrid truth of the genetic experiments.[br/]Deer fled and took refuge with her newfound people, taking up arms for protection. Since then, the Therians, with their animal modifications and human weaponry, managed to survive on many of the planets they occupied. Belonging to neither one kind nor the other, the Therian refugees are social outcasts, searching for a place they can call home whilst keeping a positive outlook on life.

[bulletlist][bullet]人类与动物基因混合而成的生物，致力于寻找一个能够平静生活的地方[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000E]生化[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,0000039E0000000F]动能[/hyperlink]伤害类型[/bullet][bullet]受伤时会使用“原始费洛蒙”来扭转战局[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]起源：兽人种族起源于泰拉科技的一个秘密基因工程测试项目，该项目试图混合动物和人类的 DNA 来治疗遗传疾病并创造更高级的生物。当他们的第一个实验对象“圣鹿”将基因实验的可怕真相传播开来之后，这个项目遭到了强烈的反对，随即被责令停止。[br/]圣鹿逃了出去并与新生的同胞躲在一起，他们拿起了武器保护自己。从那以后，兽人凭借他们的动物改造和人类武器，在他们占领的许多星球上生存了下来。他们不属于任何一个派系，兽人难民被社会排挤。但他们对生活却十分乐观，四处寻找着可以称之为家的地方。

[bulletlist][bullet]Extradimensional invaders[/bullet][bullet]Damage Type based on their Form: Arc, Biochemical, Psionic or Thermal[/bullet][bullet]Command armies of Enthralled units to do their bidding. These units perish when their Voidbringer overlords are destroyed.[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]ORIGIN: The Voidbringers are an invading, extradimensional faction of unknown origin. Their powers include bending dark energy and enthralling units to their will. Only devastation and barren landscapes are left in their wake. [hyperlink,000003E00000012A]The Therians[/hyperlink] have been known to flee various planets to escape the clutches of the Voidbringers.

[bulletlist][bullet]异次元入侵者[/bullet][bullet]伤害类型基于其形态：电弧、生化、灵能或热能[/bullet][bullet]命令被奴役的单位执行它们的意志。如果虚空使者君主被消灭，被奴役的单位也会随之消亡。[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]起源：虚空使者是来自异次元的入侵阵营，起源未知。它们能够扭曲黑暗能量并奴役军事单位服从他们的意志，所到之处只会留下满目疮痍和贫瘠的土地。[hyperlink,000003E00000012A]兽人[/hyperlink]曾经为了逃脱虚空使者的魔爪而逃离了许多星球。
Not even sure we want to use this formating

Sound Weapons project waves that are fired so rapidly or at such a frequency that they damage those hit. The Sound Weapons Group uses the Kinetic [DamagePhysical/] [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]Damage Channel[/hyperlink]. Sound Weapon abilities include Disorienting, Impairing, and Stagger.[br/][br/]Ethereal Units are resistant to the Kinetic damage channel.
音波武器发射的音波速度极快，频率也非常高，可对命中目标造成伤害。音波武器组使用动能 [DamagePhysical/] [hyperlink,000003AC00000290]伤害类型[/hyperlink]。音波武器的能力包括迷失、削弱和动摇。[br/][br/]虚灵单位对动能伤害类型具有抗性。

The Defeat the Invasion Victory is achieved when a [hyperlink,000003AC00000336]Player[/hyperlink] successfully defeats the [hyperlink,000003E5000006E3]Voidbringers[/hyperlink] by destroying enough[hyperlink,000003FB00000012]Voidbringer Spawners[/hyperlink] and then destroying the [hyperlink,000003FB00000011]Voidbringer Beacon[/hyperlink].[br/][br/]The Invasion has a random chance of occuring as can be set in Advanced World Settings. This Victory Condition will only be active if the invasion has started and the player decides to oppose the Voidbringers. Opposing the Voidbringers disables all other Victory Conditions except [hyperlink,000003A70000000A]Doomsday.[/hyperlink][br/][br/]Alternatively, when the invasion begins, the player can decide to join the Voidbringers, enabling only a Doomsday or [hyperlink,000003AC0000026E]Last Man Standing[/hyperlink] victory.[br/][br/]This Victory Condition can be optionally claimed after the Beacon is destroyed, but players can opt to not claim this Victory Condition and continue the game.

[hyperlink,000003AC00000336]玩家[/hyperlink]先摧毁足够的[hyperlink,000003FB00000012]虚空使者出生点[/hyperlink]，然后摧毁[hyperlink,000003FB00000011]虚空使者信标[/hyperlink]从而成功击败[hyperlink,000003E5000006E3]虚空使者[/hyperlink]，即可达成“击退入侵”胜利条件。[br/][br/]可以在“高级世界设置”中设置入侵随机发生的几率。只有当玩家在入侵开始时选择对抗虚空使者，此胜利条件才会生效。对抗虚空使者会禁用除[hyperlink,000003A70000000A]末日[/hyperlink]以外的其他所有胜利条件。[br/][br/]另外，玩家可以在入侵开始时选择加入虚空使者，这将仅会启用末日或[hyperlink,000003AC0000026E]强者生存[/hyperlink]胜利条件。[br/][br/]摧毁信标后即可选择宣布此胜利条件，但玩家也可以选择不宣布并继续进行游戏。

World Events are a type of global event that can occur randomly over time. Apart from the first few turns, there is a chance on every turn a World Event activates. Only one World Event can be active at any given time and they last multiple turns.[br/][br/]World Events change one or more mechanics on the [hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]Strategic[/hyperlink] and [hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]Tactical[/hyperlink] map; ranging from impacting colony income, adding additional condition effects during combat, terraforming sectors, and more.

世界事件是一种会随时间推移而随机发生的全球性事件。除了前几个回合之外，每个回合都有几率激活某个世界事件。在任意既定时间内，只会有一个世界事件激活，并且事件会持续多个回合。[br/][br/]世界事件会改变[hyperlink,000003AC000000CC]策略[/hyperlink]和[hyperlink,000003AC0000025E]战术[/hyperlink]地图上的一种或多种机制，包括影响殖民地收益、在战斗中增加额外的条件效果、改造区域地形等。

Each AI controlled player possesses two personality traits; a Preference trait and a Strategy trait.[br/][br/]The Preference trait defines what the player will like and what things they will dislike, these likes are often counterbalanced by a dislike. Acting in favor (or against) that of the preference will affect the opinion that player has of you. Furthermore, the preference trait may also slightly alter the diplomatic behavior of a player.[br/][br/]The Strategy trait defines how the player will manage their empire and changes how many wars they may have at a time but also what kind of research they are more likely to invest into, which units they will want to have and how they specialize their sectors and colonies.[br/][br/]Initially these traits will be unknown, but they can be revealed by forming an [hyperlink,000003AC000002F2]intelligence sharing treaty[/hyperlink] with the other player or by [hyperlink,00000384000005AD]infiltrating[/hyperlink] them. The Preference trait is also revealed when the opposing player generates an opinion modifier on you because of their preferences. Additionally, there is also a chance of discovering the Preference trait of the other player by changing your diplomatic state with them, performing a successful trade or by using influence to compliment/insult them.

每位由 AI 控制的玩家都拥有两种人格特性，分别是“偏好特性”和“策略特性”。[br/][br/]偏好特性决定了玩家的喜好与厌恶，喜好通常会与厌恶保持平衡。支持（或反对）该玩家的偏好将影响他们对你的评价。此外，偏好特性还可能会略微改变玩家的外交行为。[br/][br/]策略特性决定了玩家管理自己帝国的方式、在同一时间可能会与多少名玩家交战、更愿意投资哪种研究、建造哪些单位以及如何专精他们的区域和殖民地等。[br/][br/]游戏开始时，玩家的特性均是未知的，但是可以通过与另一玩家签订[hyperlink,000003AC000002F2]情报共享条约[/hyperlink]或通过[hyperlink,00000384000005AD]渗透[/hyperlink]来揭示其特性。当对方玩家由于其偏好而对你的评价发生改变时，也会揭示其偏好特性。此外，改变与另一玩家的外交关系、与其成功进行交易或利用影响力来赞美或侮辱该玩家也有一定几率揭示其偏好特性。
